mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (senderId, receiverId, content) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM message WHERE (senderId = #{senderId} AND receiverId = #{receiverId}) OR (senderId = #{receiverId} AND receiverId = #{senderId})
